name: Hellsvik
description:
While taking shelter from a snowstorm, Robin finds a mystical lantern that allows them to peer into the past. The ghost of the old Duke who lived in the mansion 200 years ago commands them to use the lantern to solve his murder.

Control Robin as they explore the excentric Duke Hellsvik's mansion in both the present and the past. Solve puzzles and eavesdrop on the conversations that happened hundreds of years ago to figure out the Duke's untimely fate.
developers: B I T T E R
